testcase.brief: Path MTU Discovery is send when tunnel with NAT receive the pkt with DF and size is beyond the Tunnel MTU
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Set up one l3 vpn with NAT
Test Procedure: 1. Create l3 VPN tunnel with NAT in BR and CVG 2. Connect one laptop to the BR 3. Set the user-profile that is assigned to the laptop as Tunnel-all 4. Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF from BR, result 1 5. Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF from CVG, result 1 6. Send the TCP with 1500 ip size and set DF from BR, result 1 7. Send the TCP with 1500 ip size and set DF from CVG, result 1

step.desc: config CVG act as l3 VPN server
step.telnet: -v "save vpn ee-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/server_cert.pem" -v "save vpn private-key tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/server_key.pem" -v "vpn xauth-client-list ${hive.name}_List local" -v "vpn xauth-client-list ${hive.name}_List client-name ${br1.br.name} password aerohive" -v "vpn server-ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server vpn-mode layer-3" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server client-list ${hive.name}_List" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy server ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}"

step.desc: enable ospf on CVG eth1
step.telnet: -v "routing protocol ospf advertise eth1" -v "routing protocol ospf router-id ${cvg1.cvg.lan.ip}" -v "routing protocol type ospf" -v "routing protocol enable" -v "interface eth0 mode wan nat"

step.desc: config BR with WAN interface, nat enable
step.telnet: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "interface eth0 mode wan nat"

step.desc: Show interface eth0 dhcp client to check if DNS server be obtained
config mgt0.1 with dhcp service enable,dns service enable
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${pub.dns1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable"

step.desc: Create ssid
step.telnet: -v "security-object ${conn1.ssid}" -v "security-object ${conn1.ssid} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1"

step.desc: config BR as l3 VPN client
step.console: -v "save vpn ca-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/cacert.pem" -v "vpn client-ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 vpn-mode layer-3" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 gateway ${cvg1.cvg.mip.ip} client-name ${br1.br.name} password aerohive" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy client ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 primary" -v "routing route-request enable" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}"

step.desc: check vpn ike sa on BR1 side
check vpn ike sa on CVG side
check gre tunnel on br1 side
check gre tunnel on cvg side
BR check route
cvg1 check route
br1.vpc1 show ip address got from mgt0 dhcp client
get br1.vpc1 ip address
open debug switch on BR
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_ff id 2 src-ip ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF
show logging buffered
open debug switch on CVG
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_ff id 2 src-ip ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip} bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: Send the UDP with 1500 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -re -e "(\(o\) eth1 ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}->${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip}.*icmp-dest-unrch|pkt DF bit set.*respond icmp unreach-frag-need)"

step.desc: delete file
Send the icmp with 1371 ip size and set DF from BR to CVG
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -re -e "(\(o\) eth1 ${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip}->${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}.*icmp-dest-unrch|pkt DF bit set.*respond icmp unreach-frag-need)"

step.desc: Send the icmp with 1371 ip size and set DF from CVG to BR
show logging buffered
step.log-match: -re -e "(\(o\) eth1 ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip}->${cvg1.vpc1.tif.ip}.*icmp-dest-unrch|pkt DF bit set.*respond icmp unreach-frag-need)"

step.desc: clear br1.vpc1 file
clear cvg1.vpc1 file
